Title: Enacts the "municipal fair acquisition act"
Summary: Enacts the "municipal fair acquisition act", providing that in any acquisition by a municipal corporation of infrastructure operated by a public utility company or private energy provider, the appraised value shall be reduced by the value of infrastructure that was financed through customer user fees, ratepayer surcharges, or other non-investor-funded mechanisms as determined by the public service commission.
LawCode: Amd ยง362, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to enacting the "municipal fair acquisition act"
